Make signatures

Source: R/makeSignatures.R
makeSignatures.Rd

makeSignatures is a wrapper of physiologies followed by getSignatures.

makeSignatures(
  keyword,
  tax.id.type,
  tax.level = "mixed",
  Frequency = c("unknown", "sometimes", "usually", "always"),
  Evidence = c("unknown", "exp", "igc", "inh", "exp"),
  min.size = 1,
  min = NULL,
  max = NULL,
  num = NULL,
  remove_false = TRUE
)

Arguments

keyword

One or more values in a character vector. The values can be checked with the showPhys function.

tax.id.type

A character string. NCBI_ID or Taxon_name.

tax.level

A taxonomy level. Check valid ranks with validRanks(). Default is 'mixed', which uses all valid ranks.

Frequency

A character string. Possible values are 'always', 'sometimes', 'usually', 'unknown'.

Evidence

A character string. Possible values are 'exp', 'igc', 'inh', 'asr', 'unknown'.

min.size

Minimum size of the signatures. Default is 1.

min

Minimum for range and numeric attributes.

max

Maximum for range and numeric attributes.

num

Exact number for numeric attributes.

remove_false

Whether include the creation of signatures with FALSE values or not. Default is TRUE, i.e., FALSE values are not included.

Value

List of signatures

Examples


bugphyzz_sigs <- makeSignatures('all', 'Taxon_name')
#> >>> Importing dataset(s) <<<
#> 
#> Finished acetate producing
#> Finished aerophilicity
#> Finished animal pathogen
#> Finished antimicrobial resistance
#> Finished antimicrobial sensitivity
#> Finished arrangement
#> Finished biofilm forming
#> Finished butyrate producing
#> Finished COGEM pathogenicity rating
#> Finished disease association
#> Finished extreme environment
#> Finished gram stain
#> Finished growth medium
#> Finished growth temperature
#> Finished habitat
#> Finished health associated
#> Finished hydrogen gas producing
#> Finished isolation site
#> Finished lactate producing
#> Finished length
#> Finished mutation rate per site per generation
#> Finished mutation rates per site per year
#> Finished optimal ph
#> Finished plant pathogenicity
#> Finished shape
#> Finished spore shape
#> Finished width
#> Finished genome size
#> Finished coding genes
#> Finished sphingolipid producing
#> 
#> >>> Creating signatures <<<
#> 
#> Warning: No signatures for animal pathogen (logical). Returning NULL.
#> Warning: No signatures for antimicrobial sensitivity (logical). Returning NULL.
#> Warning: No signatures for biofilm forming (logical). Returning NULL.
#> Warning: No signatures for COGEM pathogenicity rating (logical). Returning NULL.
#> Warning: No signatures for disease association (logical). Returning NULL.
#> Warning: No signatures for extreme environment (logical). Returning NULL.
#> Warning: No signatures for isolation site (logical). Returning NULL.
#> Warning: No signatures for optimal ph (numeric). Returning NULL.
#> Warning: No signatures for plant pathogenicity (logical). Returning NULL.
